channel.title: Most Douchebagiest/Bitchiest Teacher you've had this year?
channel.description: Mine would be my history teacher, Mrs. A . We have health the first semester, and starting two weeks ago, we switched to history (2nd semester). I was extremely lucky and she went into labor and is now out of school for the rest of the year! only had to deal with her shit for 2 weeks. This may not seem [b]bad[/b] but its is to me... she hated when people laughed. Gave out detentions like candy. You couldn't talk for more then 5 seconds without getting yelled at. classroom smelled like shit, and she would bitch about what people wore and the new "fads" such as piercings, sagging, etc. yeah she may not be THAT bad compared to some, but I wanted to start a new interesting convo. So... How about you?

item.title: Most Douchebagiest/Bitchiest Teacher you've had this year?
item.dc:creator: @joshers2k12 joshers2k12
item.description:
@joshers2k12 wrote:

Mrs. Andrews(Health Care Foundations) - She would spend half the class b-sing about random crap then expect us to get like 3 lessons and a quiz done.

Also, She gave me an incomplete(Which I would have had 10 days to fix if she hadn’t gone on maternity leave) because I was unable to complete a few labs due to being in a car accident, aanndd she wrote me up for leaving class when I had to sprint to the bathroom to vomit.

Read full topic

item.source: Most Douchebagiest/Bitchiest Teacher you've had this year?

item.title: Most Douchebagiest/Bitchiest Teacher you've had this year?
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:49, topic:431493”][quote author=Dunder Mifflin link=topic=534171.msg3910105#msg3910105 date=1328638185]

she hated when people laughed.

To be fair, that is a disruption of class.

Gave out detentions like candy. You couldn’t talk for more then 5 seconds without getting yelled at.

Don’t talk and she wont give detention.

classroom smelled like shit

That’s inexcusable.

And as for the sagging thing, it makes people look like idiots, so she’s right on that too.

Im sorry im not a teachers pet. Im sorry I have friends. Im sorry that im social-able.

Being respectful isn’t being a teachers pet, and being sociable doesn’t mean you have to talk at any waking moment. I’m sure you can sit through an hour of class and actually learn something.

Who said I was disrespectful?
[/quote]

Talking in class and sagging one’s pants can be seen as disrespectful to most.[/quote]

i dont sag (that much) and when i talk im not stupid about it. i dont get caught . its just that it annoys me, just her ego. its like sitting next to a black hole, that smells like shit

Read full topic

item.title: Most Douchebagiest/Bitchiest Teacher you've had this year?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:25, topic:431493”]English teacher. She’s a bitch 99% of the time. She yelled at me today because I had a playing card as my book marker but apparently I was playing cards??? She has buck teeth and can’t move her upper jaw when she speaks, and our classrooms just implemented microphone systems. It’s great.

She also still uses the “If you don’t do this then you can learn about it 30 minutes after school.” I just tell her okay and I’ll be at work so good luck with that.[/quote]

My school also uses that yet there only aloud to keep us behind for 10mins… Cool story.

OT: Probably my English teacher… She keeps on at me because I do jack shit in her lesson yet I still get the grades I want in assessments/exams that we have had. (C/B) (Last year of school, only few months left too WOOT).

Read full topic
